mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_gender, me_birth, me_address, me_phone) value (#{member.me_id}, #{member.me_pw}, #{member.me_name}, #{member.me_gender}, #{member.me_birth}, #{member.me_address}, #{member.me_phone});
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{user.me_pw}, me_name = #{user.me_name}, me_gender = #{user.me_gender}, me_birth = #{user.me_birth}, me_address = #{user.me_address}, me_phone = #{user.me_phone} where me_id = #{user.me_id}
mapper.select: select *from member where me_session_id = #{me_session_id} and me_session_limit >= now()
